text: I just got the job offer I've been waiting for! This is the best day of my life!
My dog passed away yesterday. I can't stop crying and I miss him so much.
I can't believe they cancelled the concert after I drove 3 hours to get there. What a waste!
I'm not sure what to think about this new policy. It could go either way.
The spider crawled across my face while I was sleeping. I nearly had a heart attack!
She said she loved me and then I found out she was seeing someone else the whole time.
I just finished my first marathon! 26.2 miles and I didn't give up!
The test results came back and the doctor wants to run more tests. I'm so worried.
I saw my ex at the party with their new partner. I couldn't even look at them.
The sunset over the ocean was absolutely breathtaking. I felt so peaceful.
